Study track

Lab Notes Maintenance Path

Track how the `.site` test domain documents experiments, sources, and implementation notes separately from `.top`.

2 steps

    Implementation Case Notes

    A lightweight area for project-style implementation notes, case studies, and experiment summaries for the `.site` lab version.

    Reference Index

    Reference index for the `.site` lab version, used to keep source lists separate from the `.top` siteâ€™s long-form citation page structure.

VLSI PD Lab is a lightweight lab-style reference for VLSI physical design learning.

Built for the `.site` test domain with different structure and metadata from the `.top` site.
